name: ieee-soldering-workshop
description: IEEE announces safety requirements for the soldering workshop.

events.content: IEEE soldering workshop sign-ups are live! Limit 25 seats. Register at https://ieee.calpoly.edu/workshops.
Complete the lab safety quiz (link in confirmation email) and wear closed-toe shoes. We provide irons + kits.
Only if someone no-shows. RSVP to lock a seat.
